credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 50 x 38 cm (19 11/16 x 14 15/16 in.)
title: Sampler
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
medium:
Medium: cotton embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: drawnwork stitches, whipped bars, aztec, loop, counted satin, cross, and double running stitches on plain weave
description: Geometric and floral patterns in cross borders; also birds, animals, alphabet and inscription: made by Benita Hernandes under the direction of Dona Eclita Ramirez. Hemstitched on four sides.
name: Sampler
